name: Fire Spirit
description: A small lively fire spirit. Created when magical essence gets in contact with fire. Perfect for roasting marshmallows!

abilities.name: Concentrated flames
abilities.description: Deals large fire damage to a single enemy

abilities.name: Flamethrower
abilities.description: Deals medium fire damage to the main target, and small fire damage to all other enemies

abilities.name: Feel the burn
abilities.description: Applies 50 stacks of burning to a single enemy. Burn lasts for 3 turns

abilities.name: Firestorm
abilities.description: Deals medium fire damage to all enemies. Applies 50 stacks of burning to all enemies. Burn lasts for 3 turns
